languages.text: "На вашем месте я бы не стал{mf||а} рисковать реликвией Дома и оставил{mf||а} все, как есть".

traits.locale_text: "На вашем месте я бы не стал{mf||а} рисковать реликвией Дома и оставил{mf||а} все, как есть".

languages.text: "If I were in your position, I would not risk losing the House's great relic. I would leave things as they were."
languages.original_text: "На вашем месте я бы не стал{mf||а} рисковать реликвией Дома и оставил{mf||а} все, как есть".

traits.locale_text: "If it were in your position, I would not risk losing the House's great relic. I would leave things as they were."
"If it were in your position, I would not risk losing the House's great relic. I would leave things as they were."
"If I were in your position, I wouldn't risk losing the House's great relic. I would leave things as they were."
"If I were in your position, I wouldn't risk losing the House's great relic. I would leave things as they were."
"If I were in your position, I would not risk losing the House's great relic. I would leave things as they were."
"If I were in your position, I would not risk losing the House's great relic. I would leave things as they were."

languages.text: 「私が同じ立場なら、オーセリオ家の重要な遺構を失う危険は侵さない。そのままにしておく」
languages.original_text: "If I were in your position, I would not risk losing the House's great relic. I would leave things as they were."

traits.locale_text: 「私が同じ立場なら、オーセリオ家の重要な遺構を失う危険は侵さない。そのままにしておく」

languages.text: “如果换做我站在你的位置，我不会冒险失去这件伟大的遗物。我会让一切保持现状。”
languages.original_text: "If I were in your position, I would not risk losing the House's great relic. I would leave things as they were."

traits.locale_text: “如果换做我站在你的位置，我不会冒险失去这件伟大的遗物。我会让一切保持现状。”

languages.text: « À votre place, je ne prendrais pas le risque de perdre la relique la plus importante de ma maison. Je laisserai les choses telles qu'elles sont. »
languages.original_text: "If I were in your position, I would not risk losing the House's great relic. I would leave things as they were."

traits.locale_text: « À votre place, je ne prendrais pas le risque de perdre la relique la plus importante de ma maison. Je laisserai les choses telles qu'elles sont. »

languages.text: «De encontrarme en tu lugar, no arriesgaría la mayor reliquia de mi casa. Lo dejaría todo tal y como estaba».
languages.original_text: "If I were in your position, I would not risk losing the House's great relic. I would leave things as they were."

traits.locale_text: «De encontrarme en tu lugar, no arriesgaría la mayor reliquia de mi casa. Lo dejaría todo tal y como estaba».

languages.text: "Ich an Eurer Stelle würde nicht riskieren, das große Relikt des Hauses zu verlieren. Ich würde alles belassen, wie es ist."
languages.original_text: "If I were in your position, I would not risk losing the House's great relic. I would leave things as they were."

traits.locale_text: "Ich an Eurer Stelle würde nicht riskieren, das große Relikt des Hauses zu verlieren. Ich würde alles belassen, wie es ist."

languages.text: "Yerinde olsam Hanemin yüce yadigârını kaybetme riskini göze almaz, hiçbir şeye müdahale etmezdim."
languages.original_text: "If I were in your position, I would not risk losing the House's great relic. I would leave things as they were."

traits.locale_text: "Yerinde olsam, Hanemin yüce yadigârını kaybetme riskini göze almazdım. Hiçbir şeye müdahale etmezdim."
